article.articlebody: We’ve all asked ourselves the question, “what is love?” It’s one of the most perplexing of all of the human experiences. It seems the more we learn about love, the more we don’t understan...

items.title: What is love – and is it all in the mind? | News | The Guardian
items.htmlTitle: What is love – and is it all in the mind? | News | The Guardian
items.snippet:
Feb 11, 2019 ... We crave romantic love like nothing else, we'll make unimaginable sacrifices for it 
and it can take us from a state of ecstasy to deepest despair.

considered close to the meaning of life, is to look at the challenges of loneliness.

items.title: Love | Definition of Love by Merriam-Webster
items.snippet:
Love definition is - strong affection for another arising out of kinship or personal 
ties. How to use love in a sentence.
